message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $750000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $950000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering its value to me.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to reach at least $925000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $912500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $875000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
